lines.text:
[the camera pans over from a shot of a bottle of champagne and some empty glasses, to Max and Darcy, who are in bed, naked. They're kissing passionately, and implied to be fucking. She is moaning, but eventually she gently pushes him off her]
Alright Max, I'm feeling tense or something. I don't know.
I'm not finished yet, honey.
I know...

[Whispering]
I'm not finished.

[Whispering, barely audible]
I know...

[Max begins focusing his powers on Darcy, and she begins moaning as she feels pleasure building in her vagina. Max backs away slightly, as, with his mind, he sends her over the edge into orgasm. She moans loudly, and writhes in pleasure under the duvet as she orgasms]

[Moaning]
Yeah! Yeah! Yeah! Yeah! Yeah!
[More moaning, before her orgasm ends, and her moans turn into giggles]
Oh God, Max... Max...
Like that did you?
[He sits up in bed]

[Still flustered]
Uh huh.

[Max chuckles, and starts to put his dressing gown on. He then looks back at Darcy, and begins to work his magic, as, off-screen the entire time, she feels another spontaneous orgasm begin within her]
Oh no... oh no. OH YES! OH! OH! OH! OH! OH! OH! OH! YES! YES! YES! OH! OH! Oh God...
[as she orgasms, Max walks into the kitchen to make coffee. Her orgasm ends, and we get a shot of her, half-off the bed, under the duvet, trying to support herself]
That was the most incredible thing I've ever felt.

[Before she can recover, Max uses his powers to make her orgasm again, and we see her wriggle on the bed as it suddenly happens]
Oh no not again! OH! OH YES! OHHH! OH! OH! OOOO! OH! OHOHOH!

[She lets out a giggle of sexual glee. Max begins making facial movements in time with her moans, such as a series of kisses, and finally, a silent scream, which causes Darcy's orgasm to reach its peak. She screams in ecstasy, and we see her fall back onto the bed, as Max finally allows her to stop orgasming]

[Panting, trying to get to grips with herself after her orgasms]
Wait... wait... Oh Max...
[She giggles gleefully]
Mommy...
[She keeps panting]
[after snorting up a bunch of powder that was supposed to banish the 'demons' from his system]
YES!
[laughs]
I LIKE IT!
According to these chicken guts, there's going to be an awfully big ruckus here this weekend.
I'm not a freak. He's a freak. I'm a goddamn good-looking man.
I'm starting to see things move in thin air. Like this morning, I think I caused Darcy's coffee cup to slide across the table and crash. And then everything around was shaking and quaking...
You trashed the place 'cause you're mad at this Daisy chick, right?
No, no, Brian, I did it but I didn't touch anything.
Look, we all think we got some monster inside us that's ready to explode any minute. You break things. I masturbate, so what? Same difference.
Are you still seeing things move?
I'm making things move.
Max, could you sit down? I have a crick in my neck.
Max, please, what is the matter with you lately? I was kidding.
Look at my face. I can't go to dinner like this. Look.
Your face looks fine.
I'm not going. I'm staying up here.
Max. Max, you promised me that you would try to relax and be close to me this weekend.
You were only kidding?
Are you gonna be okay?
Oh, yeah, I think things will be okay.
Good.
Well, not necessarily.
Poor guy. He's a prince who thinks he's a frog.
Now, we can do this easy, or we can do it rough. These is knuckles you is looking at.

[in demonic voice]
Your mama.
